objects.name: Manual
objects.string:
Manual

Your goal is to stock up 50 cactus so that you can survive a trip out of the desert! You will be alloted a limited amount of water per day from the well, and you can use fertilizer to make land suitable for growing cactus. Your cactus will grow a little day by day, eventually producing seeds, and dying. You can convert your collected cactus into more fertilizer to expand your farm and grow faster!

Holding "q" will put you in a fertilizing mode where you can select a box with your cursor and click to use your available fertilizer and make a plot of land suitable for growing cacti.

 "f" is used to plant cacti, which require 1 water and 3 seeds to plant

 "g" is used to collect grown cacti

 "r" is used to collect 1-3 seeds from fully grown cacti

"left shift" hydrates the cactus below you, it requires one water

 "c" is used to convert 4 cacti into fertilizer

 "e" is used to collect water from the well

events.comment: Delete selection menu is player is moving
Highlight the soil which player is on

parameters: "Your farm has been blessed by rain!"
"Your farm has been wrecked by a sandstorm!"
"It is a normal hot, sunny day!"
"You collected enough Cacti to escape! Congratulations!!"
"You have no seeds and no planted cactus. You've lost!"
